nodes.text: Elissiar was an individual who was affiliated with the Galactic Republic during the Republic Era. In 40 BBY, the Republic's Supreme Chancellor Kirames Kaj chose to not run for reelection. Two of the candidates to succeed her were Elissiar and the politician Finis Valorum.
Elissiar was first mentioned in Master & Apprentice, a 2019 novel written by Claudia Gray.
